alert.note: Alert for Jay (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 31 at 12:12AM EDT until March 31 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. Isolated gusts of 55 to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...In Indiana, Adams, Wells, Huntington, Jay, Grant and Blackford Counties. In Ohio, Allen OH and Van Wert Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT Thursday. The greatest gust potential exists from midnight to 6 am EDT. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
